00072 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tClientConnectReturn
00073 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::ClientConnect::
00074 connect(const char* user, const char* pwd){
00075 
00076   tClientConnectReturn ret;
00077 
00078   xmlAccountList xml;
00079 
00080   // Test if this user exists
00081   bool userExist=xml.isAccountExisting(user);
00082   if (!userExist){
00083     ret=CCR_INEXISTANT_USER;
00084   }
00085   else{
00086     RainbruRPG::Gui::tAccountListItem* player=xml.getAccount(user);
00087 
00088         LOGCATS("Account blacklist status : ");
00089         LOGCATB(player->blacklist);
00090         LOGCAT();
00091 
00092 
00093     // Test the email confirmation status
00094     if (player->confirm.empty()){
00095       ret=CCR_EMAIL_NOT_VALIDATED;
00096     }
00097     else{
00098 
00099       // Test the blacklist status
00100       if(player->blacklist){
00101         ret=CCR_BLACKLIST;
00102       }
00103       else{
00104         // Test the password
00105         HashPassword hp;
00106         string hash=hp.encryptString(pwd);
00107         bool conn=hp.compare(player->password, hash.c_str());
00108         if (conn){
00109           ret=CCR_SUCCESS;
00110         }
00111         else{
00112           ret=CCR_WRONG_PWD;
00113         }
00114       }
00115     }
00116   }
00117 
00118   return ret;
00119 }
